Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item carries a significant value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication to quality. We are excited to offer you this opportunity to own it at an exclusive price of $750000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive unparalleled value while allowing us to share our masterpiece with someone who appreciates its unique qualities. We believe this price reflects the true essence of the product and offers a fantastic opportunity for both parties. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable piece into your collection. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
